auth.description:
Please check https://invoice-ninja.readthedocs.io/en/latest/api_tokens.html#create-token
   to see how to get the API token

create_task.name: create_task
create_task.description: Creates a task instance in Invoice Ninja for billing purposes.

number.description: A unique task or ticket number that has not been used before in Invoice Ninja

description.description: Description of task to be billed

rate.description: Custom hourly rate (optional) otherwise default used

exists_task.name: exists_task
exists_task.description: Verify if a Task Already Exists

number.description: A task or ticket number to check

getclient_task.name: getclient_task
getclient_task.description: Gets the client details if they exist by e-mail.

email.description: A valid e-mail address to get client details for
